short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension listens to your meetings, courses, and lectures, then answers questions, generates ideas and more in real-time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with ActionGPT, the AI-powered Chrome extension designed to boost productivity. Whether you're in meetings, attending online courses, or watching video lectures, ActionGPT listens to the audio in real-time, providing instant insights and actionable tasks.

Key Features:

1) Real-time Audio Processing: Automatically transcribe and summarize conversations from platforms like Google Meet, Zoom, and more.
2) Smart Action Suggestions: Generate task lists, meeting notes, and deadlines effortlessly, helping you stay organized.
3) Question Answering: Get instant answers to questions based on general knowledge or uploaded PDF files.
4) Contextual Assistance: Supports multiple languages and can translate conversations, giving you accurate information based on context.

Why Install ActionGPT?
1) Increase Productivity: Streamline your workflow with actionable summaries and ideas generated directly from your browser audio.
2) Save Time: Focus on important tasks while ActionGPT handles note-taking, idea generation, and task management.
3) Seamless Integration: Compatible with popular platforms like Google Meet and Zoom for an uninterrupted experience.

ActionGPT is the perfect AI assistant for students, professionals, and anyone who needs to convert audio into meaningful actions. Get more done in less time â€“ install ActionGPT today!
